get.description: Returns real-time market data from supported protocols, such as Jupiter, Kamino, MarginFi, Lulo and many more. For more information, please check our [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets/supported-protocols).

get.summary: List all markets grouped by type
get.description: Returns real-time market data from supported protocols, such as Jupiter, Kamino, MarginFi, Lulo and many more. For more information, please check our [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets/supported-protocols).
Fetch position snapshots within a time range for a wallet address

schema.description: Start time of the snapshot. Date or datetime in RFC 3339 format
End time of the snapshot. Date or datetime in RFC 3339 format

get.summary: List all market positions by wallet address
get.description: Returns position data for supported protocols, such as Jupiter, Kamino, MarginFi, Lulo and many more. For more information, please check our [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets/supported-protocols).

schema.description: Comma separated list of owner addresses. Currently only supports one address.
Comma separated list of bundle IDs. Currently only supports one bundle ID.

bundleId.description: Identifier for positions bundled into one logical structure, such as position or market

ltv.description: Current Loan-to-Value of the position, expressed as a percentage ratio of deposited value

liquidationPrice.description: Deposited token price expressed in borrowed token units at which the position becomes liquidatable

maxLtv.description: Maximum Loan-to-Value allowed when borrowing, expressed as a percentage of deposited value

liquidationLtv.description: Loan-to-Value percentage ratio of deposited value at which the position becomes liquidatable

liquidationPenalty.description: Percentage ratio of deposited value taken as a penalty and given to liquidators when position is liquidated

apiKey.name: x-dialect-api-key
apiKey.description: API key for the Markets API
